tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE experimental_data (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_date DATE,
    bioreactor_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    pH FLOAT,
    agitation_speed INT,
    oxygen_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE bioprocessing_data (
  experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_date DATE,
  experiment_type VARCHAR(50),
  measured_parameter VARCHAR(50),
  parameter_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control_results (
  result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id UUID REFERENCES bioprocessing_data(experiment_id),
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_method VARCHAR(50),
  pass_fail BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_data (
    experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id UUID,
    experiment_date DATE,
    experiment_type VARCHAR(50),
    measured_parameter VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_details (
    sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_type VARCHAR(50),
    sample_date DATE,
    sample_location VARCHAR(100),
    sample_condition VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control (
    qc_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id UUID,
    qc_date DATE,
    qc_result BOOLEAN,
    qc_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_notes (
    note_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id UUID,
    note_date DATE,
    note_text TEXT
);
